conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation confirmed with visible wall depth and isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and volume; clean cutaway execution.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High room fidelity; minor wall length overestimation in the living area extension.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement highly accurate to the source plan, including bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Clear rendering, though bedroom-1 lacks the distinct balcony railing/recess shown in the 2D plan.

detected_errors.description: Balcony railing and sliding door detail for Bedroom-1 is simplified/missing compared to source.

summary: High-fidelity 3D conversion with exceptional layout accuracy and consistent interior furnishing relative to the original floor plan.
